DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate diabetes related treatment satisfaction patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional , observational patient survey study . Study subject adult commercial member large US health plan affiliate Optum evidence T2D initiate dapagliflozin sulfonylurea medication within 3 month prior survey mailing .
DOC.criteria: At least one pharmacy claim dapagliflozin dapagliflozin/metformin ER recent month pharmacy data pharmacy claim SGLT2 medication 6 month prior sample identification .
